documents.document: @therealgokwan @Independent my faith in humanity is slowly being restored.This is how to beat #trump.Shut him down and say #NO. He hates #NO
@SethMacFarlane @BBCBreaking this is a testing time for the world. How countries and the USA opposition react to Trump, will define future
@realDonaldTrump @nytimes you are at war with #TheTruth and #TheTruth will win ! This ain't no crap fake reality TV show ! This is #Life !
@WalesOnline cardiff should be more #CycleFriendly. The congestion around the castle needs addressing as population is increasing
@realDonaldTrump do you not have a clue how you country is run ? You look stupider than usual Mr Bad Man.
People need to understand, Trump does not think what he's doing is evil. He thinks he is doing good.Just like Hitler https://t.co/YbW59JvTNR
@Schwarzenegger dear Arnie. You the man. Sorry about the president trying have a go at you. Greetings from Wales !!!
It's only a matter of time before the shit hits the fan with Trump. He's crazy.
#Trump says #Iran is playing with fire. How would a nuclear attack on Iran affect the #Uk ?
@realDonaldTrump how could you even try to have a go at Arnie ?
@openculture @Bonn1eGreer @nytimes trump will never be impeached. This arrogance resulting in his election and Brexit.
QUOTE- #Heineken Lager is always brewed in #Holland BOLLOCKS. SUCH LIES. https://t.co/N5SQPKMCSm
The more I look into the imported lager situation in UK, the more shady and underhand it seems. All USA heineken is imported from Holland
@WetherspoonsUK thanks for selling imported #BirraMoretti and #Tsingtao.Where are your ontap #heineken, #StellaArtois and #SanMiguel brewed?
@OktoberfestCDF Will be the beer sold at the Oktoberfest be UK brewed beer, or actual real beer from abroad ?
@Twitter have the courage to shut #trump account down. He's going to take control of you, #Twitter soon so make a stand before it's to late.
Instead of insulting #trump, we have to take our hats of for him being a genius tactician who pulled of the biggest con in history. Respect.
@TheKateMulgrew am rewatching you in #voyager today.Your work has matured and aged so gracefully.Loving your performance in #Endgame.Thanks!
@BudvarUK couldn't afford barrel this week. Next wknd will definitely get one.
@Bonn1eGreer @beckykate22 @politico what Trump thinks, is what he gets. Unfortunately.
@beckykate22 @Bonn1eGreer @politico he's a dictator. He makes the rules.
Only a matter of time before #Facebook, #Twitter #Google etc come under US government control.
@realDonaldTrump shut them all down ! they are being unAmerican and should pay the price for their traitorous ways ! send in the troops !
@realDonaldTrump @nytimes Arrest everyone at the Times and their families. Put them in camps until they put out real news ! This must stop !
Rewatching #voyager. Scorpion part 2. Better than I remember.
2/2 price of a large chicken !! Â£5.50 ! and they want to sell me undrinkable crap. You wouldn't buy wine from Stoke Newington.
No one likes being conned. Sorry to say thats how I feel about major 'used to be' imported lager. This stuff is expensive ! 4 cans 1/2
There is good imported lager out there. Just been to #MarksAndSpencer and they have loads. Bought a pack 4 Belgian lager. Happy Days !!
@SophWrites #Stella #Becks # Heineken used to be proudly imported and taste good. Now they taste vile and there is nothing left to buy. 2/2
@SophWrites hello. I read Ur article on the death of lager. I have a question for you. Why is all supermarket lager now brewed in UK ? 1/2
We need more awareness of monopoly that UK brewed #stellaartois #Heineken #Becks have on UK supermarkets. They taste vile. Why no imported ?
@buffalocardiff looks nice but reducing the peas to a smudge on a plate ? NO !
No matter what i rant about, I'll never be as crazy as this fool. You seriously can't make this shit up. #trump https://t.co/InTst2ZCho
Also selling Thai imported #singha in #Tesco. I may investigate why all main lagers brewed in UK. Write a piece.Years ago was not the case.
Been Co-op. They selling #Tsingtao Lager. Brewed in China. If they can import from China, Why #Stella,#Heineken,#Becks,etc all brewed in UK?
Â£14.99 for a barrel of 5L Budvar in Iceland. About 9 pints. Think I wil invest in that. Hope is not lost. Maybe this is #brexit fault
Went on an imported lager hunt yday. #birraMoretti won the day. 3 for a fiver #Tesco. #Peroni to expensive. That was it. Rest UK brewed.
No madman in history thinks he's doing evil.They all thought it was to protect the people.#trump #dictator #fascist https://t.co/l5qtCStTFd
@DavoNyCee sorry that you live in fear every day. Learn to enjoy life. I hope Trump does well for the world but I doubt it
@Independent @indy100 if that gets back to Trump, whoever sent it will be smashing rocks for next 20 years. With their family.
To .many words. To much information. To little thought. How can people think when they're staring at a screen all the time ?
@guardian this is just the beginning.
Didn't take Trump long to become dictator. What did people expect ? Let's see where this goes
I think @piersmorgan really showed the world his true self with his comments on Ewan. Shameful
It's the greed and lack of respect from @Heineken which will be their downfall. That and shit uk lager #Heineken https://t.co/xTpJbTCo5W
Dear @Heineken_UK @Heineken I don't think you have labelled your product in line with British law. It is misleading not saying where brewed.
@Heineken_UK @Heineken it took hundreds years to get your formula right. You piss on the graves of your ancestors with ur greed #Heineken
@Heineken_UK and @Heineken couldn't be bothered to reply to me. Stick your awful tasting UK lager and have more respect for your customers.
Great respect for musicians not playing @realDonaldTrump inauguration.It's musicians and artists who really change the world not politicians
I implore people to read @realDonaldTrump s tweets.I wonder if these will be the last days of the world as we know it. Never fear bullies !
@Heineken_UK serious question. where is the country of origin on your new cans ? It just says made in EU. Isn't that against the law ?
it is underhand to not say where @heineken is brewed on the can. You don't buy wine from Bognor Regis. Shameful
@Heineken has joined the list of Stella, and Becks and now tastes as shit as you'd expect from being brewed in the UK. Now what ?
@Heineken I bought see Heineken today and it doesn't say where it's brewed. Is it now brewed in UK and not holland ?
Please America do not make Trump president. I still think he will be assassinated or there will be a military coup.
It's Sunday politics. Not sunday superdicks. What is that trump arselicking piers Morgan doing on the show ?
Just over 7 days to save the world. When he gets in the darkness will fall. #Trump

@Sensationalistz @Bonn1eGreer @DailyMailUK keep your friends close but your enemies closer. I still read the daily mail but fuck the app.
@guardian bollocks is it. Is there any food group not demonised ?
@guardian it's the end of the world as we know it- r e m

@littleappleseed I try not to watch ads. It's low level brainwashing. Have you seen new black mirror. So good !
Someone complained about my video of me being harassed by @ArrivaTW staff. It's been taken down. I wonder who ? Thankfully police saw it.
I'll put it out there. Will the #usa #army, #navy #police have a #coup and take control of #America before #trump gets in ?
Social media isn't bringing the world together,its dividing it.Staring at a phone and screen constantly is making ppl mentally ill globally
I like how lots of people are taking a break from #Twitter,#facebook,etc after #trump.#Introspection, #thought and #reverie are where its at

And so the world falls into darkness. Well done #America
MY NEXT TWEET WILL BE IN A NEW WORLD
#PresidentTrump ? I hope not or it's #GameOver for #PlanetEarth now i don't know. come back in 2 dAYS
The look of this young guy when I said get of facebook for a week was akin to me saying go blind for a week. Successful brainwashing.
It is so strange that I find people I know with addictive personalities are the worst culprits of being addicted to social media. #NoIrony
I am part of the last generation that has lived without it. I fear for future generations who are indoctrinated,like religion, from birth
I have come to the conclusion that social media is as addictive as crack,and just as useless.But it makes billions so is socially acceptable
Good luck #America #USA vote #Clinton or the world is literally #fucked
